marklogic.body: Agreed. There is nothing written saying that we are guaranteed free or subsidized anything. We are, however, guaranteed Life, Liberty, and the Pursuit of Happiness. There is nothing saying the government is to provide that. I think the Founding Fathers would be appalled at this country where the government gives things away to lazy people, or giving money to a grown man who doesn't work because he prefers to stay home and wear diapers and drink from a bottle while some of us are working our butts Off to support our own families. I am in the military and have healthcare but I work for it. I don't want to pay for Mr Smith down the street to go to a doctor every time he Coughs and the government will not force me to buy anything. That is what happened in Russia and looked what happened to them
